issue.title: [CI][macOS] Fix Python 3.9 installation by Homebrew
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10993](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10993). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/1579780011#step:4:520

```

==> Pouring python@3.9-3.9.1_1.catalina.bottle.tar.gz
Error: The `brew link` step did not complete successfully
The formula built, but is not symlinked into /usr/local
Could not symlink bin/2to3
Target /usr/local/bin/2to3
already exists. You may want to remove it:
  rm '/usr/local/bin/2to3'

To force the link and overwrite all conflicting files:
  brew link --overwrite python@3.9

To list all files that would be deleted:
  brew link --overwrite --dry-run python@3.9

Possible conflicting files are:
/usr/local/bin/2to3 -> /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/bin/2to3
```
